```{r}
#| label: fig-C-2
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-width: 7
#| echo: false

message("CHILD PATCHWORK PURE: Starting")

# Alternative approach using pure ggplot
i <- 1
surv_data <- create_survival_data(n = 150, seed = 123 + i)

# Create survival objects
surv_obj_treatment <- survfit(Surv(time, event) ~ treatment, data = surv_data)
surv_obj_stage <- survfit(Surv(time, event) ~ stage, data = surv_data)

message("CHILD PATCHWORK PURE: Survival objects created")

# Convert to ggplot-friendly data frames
surv_treatment_df <- convert_survfit_to_df(surv_obj_treatment, "treatment")
surv_stage_df <- convert_survfit_to_df(surv_obj_stage, "stage")

message("CHILD PATCHWORK PURE: Data frames converted")

# Plot 1 - Pure ggplot survival by treatment
p1_pure <- ggplot(surv_treatment_df, aes(x = time, y = surv, color = group)) +
  geom_step(size = 1.2) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = lower, ymax = upper, fill = group), alpha = 0.2, color = NA) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Treatment A" = color_primary, "Treatment B" = color_secondary)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Treatment A" = color_primary, "Treatment B" = color_secondary)) +
  base_theme +
  labs(
    title = paste0('Survival by Treatment (Pure - ', i, ')'),
    x = 'Time (months)',
    y = 'Survival Probability',
    caption = paste(my_pnl1_cap, "(Pure ggplot)"),
    color = 'Treatment',
    fill = 'Treatment'
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    plot.margin = unit(c(0.8, 0.1, 0.1, 1), 'cm'),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 11, margin = margin(t = 2, b = 2, unit = 'pt'))
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1))

message("CHILD PATCHWORK PURE: p1_pure created")

# Plot 2 - Pure ggplot survival by stage  
p2_pure <- ggplot(surv_stage_df, aes(x = time, y = surv, color = group)) +
  geom_step(size = 1.2) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = lower, ymax = upper, fill = group), alpha = 0.2, color = NA) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Advanced" = "#2E8B57", "Early" = "#CD853F")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Advanced" = "#2E8B57", "Early" = "#CD853F")) +
  base_theme +
  labs(
    title = paste0('Survival by Disease Stage (Pure - ', i, ')'),
    x = 'Time (months)',
    y = 'Survival Probability',
    caption = paste(my_pnl2_cap, "(Pure ggplot)"),
    color = 'Stage',
    fill = 'Stage'
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    plot.margin = unit(c(2.2, 0.1, 0.05, 0.1), 'cm'),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 11, margin = margin(t = 2, b = 2, unit = 'pt'))
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1))

message("CHILD PATCHWORK PURE: p2_pure created")

# Combine with patchwork (pure ggplot objects)
child_pure_combined <- p1_pure / p2_pure + 
  plot_annotation(
    title = paste(my_title, "(Pure ggplot)"),
    subtitle = paste(my_subtitle, "(Alternative approach)"),
    caption = paste(final_caption, "(Pure ggplot)"),
    tag_levels = '1',
    tag_suffix = ')',
    theme = theme_border
  ) +
  plot_layout(
    heights = c(1, 1),
    guides = 'collect'
  )

message("CHILD PATCHWORK PURE: Patchwork combined, about to print")
print(child_pure_combined)
message("CHILD PATCHWORK PURE: Print completed")
```
